title: Potential RCE via Unchecked External Input
description: The code reads a configuration file and executes certain operations based on the content of that file. If an attacker can control the contents of this file, they might be able to inject malicious commands.
fix: Validate and sanitize all external inputs before processing them. Use safe APIs and avoid using system calls directly with user-provided data.

reasoning.pattern: Reading and executing commands from an external file without validation
reasoning.exploit_example: An attacker could modify the 'presets.conf' or 'favorites.conf' files to include malicious commands that would be executed by the application.
